sn38.2:1.5: “Atthi panavuso, maggo atthi patipada etassa arahattassa sacchikiriyaya”ti?
sn38.2:1.6: “Atthi kho, avuso, maggo atthi patipada etassa arahattassa sacchikiriyaya”ti.
sn38.2:1.7: “Katamo panavuso, maggo katama patipada etassa arahattassa sacchikiriyaya”ti?
sn38.2:1.8: “Ayameva kho, avuso, ariyo atthangiko maggo etassa arahattassa sacchikiriyaya, seyyathidam—
sn38.2:1.10: Ayam kho, avuso, maggo, ayam patipada etassa arahattassa sacchikiriyaya”ti.
sn38.2:1.11: “Bhaddako, avuso, maggo bhaddika patipada etassa arahattassa sacchikiriyaya.
